DataElement.preferredName: Dynamic Enhanced CT Scan Portal Venous Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response of yes or no to indicate if the dynamic enhanced CT scan occured in the system of vessels in which blood, after passing through one capillary bed, is conveyed through a second set of capillaries before it returns to the systemic circulation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dynamic Enhanced CT Scan Portal Venous
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A type of computer tomography whereby a contrast medium is administered intravenously or orally prior to X-ray imaging._The data or image obtained by gathering information with a sensing device._A system of vessels in which blood, after passing through one capillary bed, is conveyed through a second set of capillaries before it returns to the systemic circulation. It pertains especially to the hepatic portal system.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A type of computer tomography whereby a contrast medium is administered intravenously or orally prior to X-ray imaging.:The data or image obtained by gathering information with a sensing device.

Concepts.definition: A type of computer tomography whereby a contrast medium is administered intravenously or orally prior to X-ray imaging.
The data or image obtained by gathering information with a sensing device.

Property.preferredDefinition: A system of vessels in which blood, after passing through one capillary bed, is conveyed through a second set of capillaries before it returns to the systemic circulation. It pertains especially to the hepatic portal system.

Concepts.definition: A system of vessels in which blood, after passing through one capillary bed, is conveyed through a second set of capillaries before it returns to the systemic circulation. It pertains especially to the hepatic portal system.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
